title: Colm Gildernew – 2022 Comments on Decision of Nurses to Strike
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Colm Gildernew, the MLA for Fermanagh and South Tyrone, on 9 November 2022.
content:
Nurses shouldn’t have been forced onto the streets to take strike action.
